clauses.vestingLanguage: Subject to the Companies Act 2006, founder shares shall vest over time as specified.
clauses.ipAssignment: All intellectual property created in the course of employment automatically vests in the Company under UK law.
clauses.taxNotice: Founders should seek independent tax advice regarding potential Capital Gains Tax and Entrepreneurs' Relief implications.
clauses.companyFormation: Company must be incorporated as a private limited company under the Companies Act 2006.
clauses.shareClasses: Share classes must comply with the Companies (Model Articles) Regulations 2008.
